trans-unit.source: Writes records of transactional actions to a log.
trans-unit.target: 将事务性操作的记录写入日志。

trans-unit.source: Each clerk is associated with a compensator, which is called back to perform actions during the two-phase commit of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 每个分配器是事务的与补偿，回叫的两阶段提交执行操作相关联。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将此类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the corresponding <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示相应<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Compensator>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the compensator.
trans-unit.target: 补偿器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The description of the compensator.
trans-unit.target: 补偿器的说明。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.CompensatorOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.CompensatorOptions" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A type that represents the compensator.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示补偿器的类型。

trans-unit.source: The description of the compensator.
trans-unit.target: 补偿器的说明。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.CompensatorOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.CompensatorOptions" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Frees the resources of the current Clerk before it is reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 在由垃圾回收器回收之前释放当前 Clerk 的资源。

trans-unit.source: Forces all log records to disk.
trans-unit.target: 强制将所有日志记录存入磁盘。

trans-unit.source: The Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Worker and CRM Compensator use this method to write records lazily to the log, which means they are not made durable until they have been forced to the log.
trans-unit.target: 补偿资源管理器 (CRM) 辅助角色和 CRM 补偿器使用此方法无法记录延迟写入日志，这意味着，它们没有成为持久直到强制写入日志。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk.ForceLog%2A> makes all log records that have been written durable on disk.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk.ForceLog%2A>使都已写入的所有日志记录在磁盘上持久。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Performs an immediate abort call on the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 对事务执行立即中断调用。

trans-unit.source: Does not deliver the last log record that was written by this instance of this interface.
trans-unit.target: 不传递该接口的此实例已写入的最后的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: This can only be used to forget the last record, there is no concept of nesting; that is, "Write, Forget, Write, Forget" is valid, but "Write, Write, Forget, Forget" is not.
trans-unit.target: 这仅可用于忘记最后一条记录，嵌套; 没有概念即"编写，忘记、 写入、 忘记"是有效的但不是"写入、 写入、 忘记、 忘记"。

trans-unit.source: A log record that has been forgotten is not delivered to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator during transaction outcome notifications.
trans-unit.target: 事务结果通知期间忘记了自己的日志记录未传递到补偿资源管理器 (CRM) 补偿。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of log records.
trans-unit.target: 获取日志记录的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of log records.
trans-unit.target: 日志记录的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the transaction unit of work (UOW).
trans-unit.target: 获取表示事务工作单元 (UOW) 的值。

trans-unit.source: A GUID representing the UOW.
trans-unit.target: 表示 UOW 的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The log record to write to the log.
trans-unit.target: 要写入日志的日志记录。

trans-unit.source: Writes unstructured log records to the log.
trans-unit.target: 将未结构化的日志记录写入日志。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。
